sqlReaderQuery.value:
SELECT QUESTION_ID, [NAME] AS QUESTION_NAME, SHORT_QSTN_TXT AS QUESTION_TXT_SHORT, FULL_QSTN_TXT AS QUESTION_TXT_FULL, CONCAT(UPPER(LEFT(OPTION_TYP,1)), LOWER(RIGHT(OPTION_TYP,LEN(OPTION_TYP)-1))) AS OPTION_TYPE, CASE WHEN REQUIRED=1 THEN 'Required' WHEN REQUIRED=0 THEN 'Optional' ELSE 'N/A' END AS QUESTION_REQD, CASE WHEN ACTIVE=1 THEN 'Active' WHEN ACTIVE=0 THEN 'Inactive' ELSE 'N/A' END AS QUESTION_STATUS, SECTION_ID AS QUESTION_SECTION_ID, AVOID_QSTN_IND AS SURVEY_AVOID_IND, ORDERING AS QUESTION_ORDERING_ID, CREATE_TS, UPDATE_TS, EXPIRY_TS
FROM [CENSUS].[QUESTION]
WHERE EXTRACT_SESSION_CD='@{pipeline().parameters.p_EXTRACT_SESSION_CD}'
